meanings.sent1: She rereviews her notes before the exam to make sure she understands everything.
meanings.sent2: He always rereviews his work to catch any mistakes before submitting it.
meanings.sent3: The detective rereviews the case file and discovers a crucial clue that was missed the first time.
meanings.sent4: Just like a gardener rereviews their plants for signs of disease, she carefully examines each detail of the report.
meanings.sent5: The teacher rereviews the lesson using different examples to help the students grasp the concept better.

meanings.definition: The act of reviewing something again.
meanings.sent1: After receiving feedback, she rereviews her essay to make necessary revisions.
meanings.sent2: The rereviews of the product highlighted areas for improvement in the next version.
meanings.sent3: The rereviews of the movie were mixed, with some viewers enjoying it more the second time.
meanings.sent4: The rereviews of the play brought out new insights into the characters and plot.
meanings.sent5: The rereviews of the book praised the author's attention to detail and character development.
